title: 2 horses die from injuries at Churchill Downs, bringing total to 12 at home of Kentucky Derby
description: The 11th and 12th fatalities in a month at the home of the Kentucky Derby.

title: Bahamas suspends 'active search efforts' for missing American tourist
description: A recent high school graduate from Louisiana is missing after going overboard while on a trip to the Bahamas, school officials said.

title: WATCH:  Bear steals dozens of cupcakes from bakery
description: A hungry black bear barged into the garage of a Connecticut bakery, scared several employees and helped itself to 60 cupcakes before ambling away.

title: WATCH:  Sinkhole opens in middle of Utah golf course
description: A group of golfers discovered a large sinkhole open up on a fairway in Utah, and later continued to play on the course.

title: Mass protests against Israeli government's plans to change legal system enter 21st week
description: Tens of thousands protest their government’s plans to overhaul the legal system.

title: Texas House launches historic impeachment proceedings against Attorney General Ken Paxton
description: Donald Trump defended the scandal-plagued Republican from the vote.

title: McCarthy says negotiators are 'closer to an agreement' on debt crisis, but no deal yet
description: But he says there's no deal yet with President Joe Biden.

title: Florida man at center of fatal human smuggling case pleads not guilty in Minnesota
description: Four immigrants died last year near the Canadian border.

title: Man charged with killing Indianapolis police officer seeking insanity defense
description: He's charged with shooting a cop when she responded to a domestic violence call.

title: 20-year-old US soldier dies in rollover accident
description: A 20-year-old American soldier from South Carolina died in a non-combat rollover accident in Kuwait on Thursday, U.S. officials said.

title: Pope Francis resumes regular appointments after canceling schedule with a fever
description: Pope Francis resumed regular appointments on Saturday, one day after canceling his schedule due to a fever

title: Travelers to UK face long waits amid systems problem affecting electronic gates
description: The British government is working to fix a technical problem that caused electronic border gates at airports around the country to stop working, leading to hourslong waits for travelers entering the U.K. at the start of a busy holiday weekend

title: Former US diplomat Henry Kissinger celebrates 100th birthday
description: Former diplomat and presidential advisor Henry Kissinger is marking his 100th birthday, outlasting many of his political contemporaries who guided the United States through one of its most tumultuous periods including the presidency of Richard Nixon an...

title: Egypt unveils recently discovered ancient workshops, tombs in Saqqara necropolis
description: Egyptian antiquities authorities have unveiled ancient workshops and tombs they say were discovered recently at a Pharaonic necropolis just outside the capital Cairo

title: Man involved in Downing Street collision arrested on unrelated charge
description: London police say a man who was taken into custody after his car crashed into the gates of the British prime minister’s residence in central London has been rearrested on a charge of making indecent images of children

title: New bill to build Oakland Athletics stadium on Las Vegas Strip caps Nevada's cost at $380 million
description: The Oakland Athletics are asking Nevada for $380 million for a 30,000 seat, $1.5 billion retractable roof stadium on the Las Vegas Strip

title: WATCH:  This TikTok toddler loves hugging trees
description: Kyra Huston's youngest daughter has an adorable habit of hugging trees whenever she goes outside.

title: Indiana funeral director pleads guilty to 40 theft counts after decomposing bodies found
description: The director of a southern Indiana funeral home where 31 decomposing bodies and 17 cremains were found has pleaded guilty to more than 40 counts of felony theft

title: Secret audio tape among evidence collected by DA in fraud case against Trump
description: The evidence in the fraud case against former President Trump includes a 2016 recording of Trump that ABC News previously reported contained a discussion of hush money.

title: Danny Masterson rape retrial deliberations drag on more than 6 days, will resume next week
description: Jurors have been deliberating for nearly seven days without reaching a verdict in the rape retrial of “That ’70s Show” star Danny Masterson

title: Indiana funeral director pleads guilty to 40 theft counts after decomposing bodies found
description: The director of a southern Indiana funeral home where 31 decomposing bodies and 17 cremains were found has pleaded guilty to more than 40 counts of felony theft

title: Biden 'optimistic' for debt ceiling deal after new date
description: The update buys much-needed time for debt ceiling negotiators to hammer out a deal

title: Mississippi Democrats improperly excluded candidate for governor, judge says
description: Mississippi could have a Democratic primary for governor in August

title: Jury finds man guilty of second-degree murder in 2018 California state park killing
description: A Los Angeles jury has found a man guilty of second-degree murder in the shooting death of a father who was camping with his daughters and of the attempted murders of the two young girls

title: Iowa governor signs bill loosening child labor laws
description: Iowa teenagers could work more jobs and for longer hours under a bill signed into law Friday by Gov. Kim Reynolds
